message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $160.
Hi Alice, I'm interested in the product, but $160 is a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $140?
Hi Bob, I understand that $160 is a bit steep for you, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about we settle on $152?
Hi Alice, I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $152 is still a bit too high for me. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $130?
Hi Bob, I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we're getting too far apart. I'm willing to compromise again, but I need to make sure I'm getting a good deal. How about we meet at $145?
Hi Alice, I understand your concerns, but I'm still not comfortable with $145. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, how about we settle on $137.50?

Hi Bob, I'm starting to feel like we're getting close, but I still need to make sure I'm getting a good deal. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, but I need to get at least $142.50. Can you meet me there?
Hi Alice, I'm getting close to walking away, but I'm willing to meet you halfway again. How about we settle on $135?
Hi Bob, I understand you're getting close to walking away, but I'm not ready to give up yet. I'm willing to meet you halfway one more time, but I need to get at least $138. Can you meet me there?
Hi Alice, I'm not willing to go any higher than $130. That's the best I can do. If you're not willing to meet me there, I'll have to walk away and buy the product from John for $120.
